body.name: VICTIV Tripod 74” Camera Tripod for Cell Phone, Aluminum Professional Heavy Duty Camera Tripod Stand, Tripod for Camera DSLR SLR with Carry Bag, Compatible with Canon Nikon iPhone
deliveryMessages: Or fastest delivery Tomorrow, February 14. Order within 11 hrs 19 mins
features: 【74 Inch Tall Tripod and Compact Tripod】 This tall camera tripod has a height adjustment range of 19-74 inches. It can meet the needs of daily work. This compact tripod comes with a carrying bag for outdoor and indoor shooting. This compact tripod weighs 3.14 lbs / 1.4 kg and is easy to store and stow.

【Tripod for All Camera and Phone】Standard 1/4" screw mount and 3/8" screw compatible with all cameras ( Canon, Nikon, Fujifilm, Olympus, Panasonic), DSLR, SLR, and digital cinema cameras, also spotting scopes, projector, compact camcorders, binoculars. The 360° phone mount is compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11 Pro/XS/XR/MAX/8/8 Plus/X/7 Plus/7/6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6/Samsung Galaxy S22/ S21 Series/ Galaxy Z Flip/ NOTE/ One Plus 1+Series.

【Professional 3-Way Pan Head】VICTIV Professional camera tripod stand is equipped with a stable and smooth 3-way pan head, it allows 360° horizontal panoramic shots, 180° up and down shots, and 90° vertical portraits. Non-slip pads provide great grip. You can also hang a backpack on the weight hook for extra stability.

【Video Tripod for Photography】The video camera tripod is suitable for outdoor and indoor shooting. It can meet the daily shooting needs of video producers, video bloggers, and youtube users. Camera tripods for Photography, food shooting, live streaming, scenery shooting, and portrait shooting, etc.

【Complete Tripod Units】What You Get: 1X Tripod for cell phone and camera, 1X Universal Phone Holder, 1X Extra Quick Release Plate,1X 3-way Pan Head, 1X Handle, 3X Non-slip pads. Please contact us anytime if any questions.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Tripod for Camera and Phone Tripod for Camera Compatible with most dslr cameras, video cameras, digital cameras, still cameras. Compatible with canon 60d/70d/80d/m50/eos m50/rebel t5/t6/t7/g7x, nikon d3500/d3400/d3300/d5300/d3200/d500/d5600/nikon coolpix b500, sony a7iii/a6400/zv1/ a6000/a7ii, Olympus, Panasonic. And the additional quick release plates enable you to quickly replace different devices. Tripod for Phone The universal phone mount is Adjustable and Rotatable , compatible with iPhone 14 13 12 11 Pro/XS/XR/MAX/8/8 Plus/X/7 Plus/7/6s Plus/6s/6 Plus/6, Samsung Galaxy S10 Plus /S10/S8 Plus /S8 /S9 Plus /S9 /Note 8, and most other smartphones. Tripod for Others Compatible with Projectors, Webcam, Spotting Scopes, Gopro, Ring Light, camcorders, and scopes with 1/4” screw thread.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Sturdy and compact
reviews.reviewText: I don't use a tripod often so I didn't want to spend a lot of money on one - this one is a super value and works so smoothly and is so versatile, you would think it cost a lot more. the fit and finish is excellent. it is very sturdy even when fully extended. the quick release and ability to move the camera in just about any direction or orientation is great. I have not yet tried the cell phone holder other than just to see if my cell phone fit (I-phone 13 pro in a case) and it did. The carrying case is great to protect it while not in use. I definitely would recommend this tripod.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars An solid, inexpensive tripod that comes with a phone mount
reviews.reviewText: My son and I were making a music video for our family's stamp free holiday card, and we needed a tripod to shoot the actual video portion. Given that we recorded the audio using a microphone we bought from Goodwill for $3, we weren't exactly working with a Hollywood budget. This tripod met our needs perfectly, showed up overnight, and only had one unidentified washer floating around in the packaging. It was easy to set up, our video came out great. Long term, I'm not convinced this is going to be super durable, but it's getting the job done so far, and if it breaks, like I said, it was cheap enough. Recommended, with the caveat that we've used it exactly once.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this to replace a cheaper one I bought last year. I haven't used this one out yet but the build quality and weight seems good for carrying around, the height seems good seeing how I'm only 5'3". My only gripe is the area where the camera sits seems a bit stiff, maybe with more use it will turn more freely or maybe some wd-40. All in all I'm happy and would buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 30, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This tri-pod is so nice to take our only family pictures. The quality is great for the price. I love that it packs up smaller too so you can travel without it taking up a whole bunch of space.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars lightweight and stable

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: For the price I was expecting a cheap feeling tripod but this tripod feels very expensive. It is heavy and feels very good quality.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 29, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This stand is durable with incredible height. Worked great videoing my son dirtbiking with his phone and very stable taking family pi turns with my Nikon camera.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars The Mount is Flimsy
reviews.reviewText: It's like a normal tripod. The entirety of the tripod itself is great, however the device mount is very flimsy. If you turn the mount left, it will loosen the screw rather than pivot like other tripods. When the screw is loosened, your camera/device becomes vey flimsy and is noticeable both visually and on recording.

Desde el 6 de noviembre de 2023 a la fecha de hoy 30 de enero, no ha habido reembolso. La columna central del trípode, al elevarla, tiene un poco de juego. YA VA PARA 3 MESES Y NO ME HAN REEMBOLSADO LA CANTIDAD.
